short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Write down your thoughts quickly, with a simple ALT + A

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This is an extremely simple write a note extension, just activate the extension by clicking on it or with ALT + A, and type your note or thought.

You can also change the theme and download your note.
